org.gcn.plinguacore.util.psystem.rule.checkRule

Interface CheckRule

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public interface CheckRule
extends java.io.Serializable
    This interface defines all the functionality to test if a rule complies with all the conditions stated by a model
    Author:
    Research Group on Natural Computing (http://www.gcn.us.es)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean checkRule(IRule r)
      Checks if the rule r fulfills the terms stated
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getCauses()
      Gets the conditions which the rule didn't comply with
      java.lang.String getCausesString()
      Gets a String which represent all the conditions not complied by the rule

    • Method Detail

      • checkRule

        boolean checkRule(IRule r)
        Checks if the rule r fulfills the terms stated
        Parameters:
        r - the rule to be checked
        Returns:
        true if the rule fulfills the terms stated, false otherwise

      • getCauses

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> getCauses()
        Gets the conditions which the rule didn't comply with
        Returns:
        a list of String, each one reports one term that the rule didn't comply with

      • getCausesString

        java.lang.String getCausesString()
        Gets a String which represent all the conditions not complied by the rule
        Returns:
        a String which represent all the conditions not complied by the rule
